EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us For A Webinar with BOFI Federal Bank
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
"Become The Realtor's Obvious Choice" with J. Shoop / B of I Federal Bank
Join us for a Webinar on July 15
Join National Account Executive J. Shoop to learn how to have three simple, purposeful conversations Realtors and other strategic partners to help separate yourself from the competition.
Title:
"Become The Realtor's Obvious Choice" with J. Shoop / B of I Federal Bank
Date:
Tuesday, July 15, 2014
Time:
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM PDT
After registering you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the Webinar.
System Requirements PC-based attendees Required: Windows® 8, 7, Vista, XP or 2003 Server
Mac®-based attendees Required: Mac OS® X 10.6 or newer
Mobile attendees Required: iPhone®, iPad®, Android™ phone or Android tablet
Space is limited. Reserve your Webinar seat now at: https://www4.gotomeeting.com/register/772973591
